front.title: A YANG Data Model for MPLS Base and Static LSPs

abstract.t: This document contains a specification of two YANG modules, the MPLS base, and Static LSP YANG modules. The MPLS base YANG module serves as a base framework for configuring and managing an MPLS switching subsystem. The MPLS Static LSP module augments the MPLS base YANG module with specific data to configure and manage MPLS Static LSP(s). It is expected that other MPLS YANG modules for MPLS technology YANG modules (e.g. MPLS LDP or MPLS RSVP-TE) will also augment the MPLS YANG base model.
